title: Textile, 1800–1850
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Mezzaro in a multicolored design on a white ground. Sprays of roses and other flowers connected vertically by thorny stems. Background covered with tiny black dots. Double floral border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1800–1850.
1800–1850. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-8.
